actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received From DOD.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend section 5 of the Uniformed Survivors Benefits Amendments of 1980 to provide the same annuity benefits to the surviving spouses of certain former members of the uniformed services who died before September 21, 1972, but after their discharge or release from active duty, as are provided under such section to the surviving spouses of certain former members who died before such date while serving on active duty.

summary.text: Amends the Uniformed Survivors Benefits Amendments of 1980 to entitle certain individuals who were widowed on or before September 21, 1972, and who are not covered by the Military Survivor Benefit Plan to an annuity.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5 of the Uniformed Survivors Benefits Amendments of 1980 to provide the same annuity benefits to the surviving spouses of certain former members of the uniformed services who died before September 21, 1972, but after their discharge or release from active duty, as are provided under such section to the surviving spouses of certain former members who died before such date while serving on active duty.
